name: @skreet/prune-cluster
description: Fast and realtime marker clustering for Leaflet (modified for Skreet)

scripts.build:dist: bun build ./src/**.ts --outdir dist --minify && cp LeafletStyleSheet.css src/LeafletStyleSheet.css
scripts.build:dev: bun build ./src/**/*.ts --outdir build --target es5 --sourcemap && cp LeafletStyleSheet.css build/LeafletStyleSheet.css
